headline: Constellation Energy (CEG) to Invest Billions in Pennsylvania
summary: Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) is one of the 12 Best Performing AI Stocks So Far in 2025. On July 15, Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) announced that it will be spending billions of dollars on nuclear energy projects to drive economic growth in Pennsylvania. This announcement was made at the state’s inaugural Energy and Innovation Summit. […]

headline: Constellation Accepting Applications for 2025 Energy to Educate Grants
summary: BALTIMORE, August 04, 2025--Constellation is accepting applications for its 2025 Energy to Educate grant program, which supports student projects focusing on energy innovation.
